alert.note: Alert for Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 7:07PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central La Paz and San Bernardino Counties through 800 PM MST... At 707 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Parker, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parker, Buckskin Mountain Park, Bouse and Poston. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 72 between mile markers 14 and 26. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 122 and 146, between mile markers 148 and 154, and between mile markers 156 and 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
